DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study gain safety efficacy information patient type 2 diabetes , previously take oral antidiabetic medication , HbA1c value great equal 10 % , despite diet exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety In Poorly Controlled Type 2 Diabetics
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Type 2 diabetes Drugnaive . Laboratory test result HbA1c great equal 10 % . Written informed consent . Exclusion criterion : Prior use antidiabetic medication within 3 month screen . Fluid retention ( edema ) . Significant liver disease . Low red blood cell ( anemia ) . Severe unstable angina ( chest pain ) . Congestive heart failure . Severe high blood pressure . Alcohol drug abuse . Other inclusion exclusion criterion determine physician study sponsor .
